name: AMERICA'S HEALTH INSURANCE PLANS
description: Trade association representing health insurance providers
sampleDescriptions: Monitoring and reporting on issues affecting the insurance industry including the health insurance tax and other possible changes to the ACA.
Issues related to the health insurance industry; issues related to repeal or delay of the health insurance tax

Issues related to the health insurance industry including surprise billing and issues related to employed provided coverage; issues related to legislation in response to the COVID-19 crisis
Issues impacting the health insurance industry
Issues impacting the health insurance industry; Issues related to employer sponsored coverage
Issues impacting the health insurance industry including medicare advantage and employer sponsored coverage, among other issues
Issues related to and affecting the health insurance industry including Medicare Advantage, taxes, employer sponsored coverage among others.
